com.googlecode.gwtphonegap.client
Interface PhoneGap

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhoneGapBrowserImpl, PhoneGapStandardImpl
public interface PhoneGap

This class is a wrapper class for phonegap.js The implementation is based on http://docs.phonegap.com/ Available modules are:

  • Accelerometer
  • Camera
  • Capture
  • Compass
  • Conntection
  • Contacts
  • Device
  • Events
  • File
  • Geolocation
  • Media
  • Log
  • Notification

Author:
Daniel Kurka

Method Detail

isPhoneGapInitialized

boolean isPhoneGapInitialized()
Determine if phonegap is initialized

Returns:
true if phonegap is initialized

initializePhoneGap

void initializePhoneGap()
Initializes Phonegap with a default timeout see: PhoneGapStandardImpl.initializePhoneGap(int)

initializePhoneGap

void initializePhoneGap(int timeoutInMs)
initialize Phonegap If Phonegap is initialized successfully within timeout a PhoneGapAvaibleEvent is fired, else a PhoneGapTimeoutEvent is fired

Parameters:
timeoutInMs - the timeout in milliseconds

setEventBus

void setEventBus(com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.EventBus handlerManager)
Allows to replace the default handlerManager used in PhoneGap by your own one so as you can share it in your application. You should change it before adding any handler to PhoneGap.

Parameters:
handlerManager - your EventBus instance
